name: Clever Kids: Creepy Crawlers
description:
Back of Case - Wii (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

"Hi, I'm Sprocket..... Join me on a journey to meet some slimiest, squirmiest, wriggliest creatures on earth. From the tiniest insects to huge beetles, giant centipedes and deadly spiders, you'll learn everything you need to become a master of creepy-crawly knowledge!"

  • Play a host of fun games: Help a dung beetle, defend a garden against centipedes and spiders, solve jigsaws, beat the Quiz and much more!
  • Clever Kids games make learning and development Fun For all ages.
